phase_name: Convert Universal Phase Specification to Machine-Readable Format
objective: Convert UNIVERSAL PHASE SPECIFICATION.txt to Spec-Doc v1 format with stable section IDs (UPS-*) and metadata index

acceptance_tests.description: All sections have stable UPS-* IDs
acceptance_tests.command: python -c "import re, json; data=open('specs/metadata/ups_index.json').read(); ids=re.findall(r'UPS-\d{3}', data); print(len(ids) >= 10)"
python -c "import json; d=json.load(open('specs/metadata/ups_index.json')); print('sections' in d and len(d['sections']) > 0)"
python -c "import re; content=open('specs/UNIVERSAL_PHASE_SPEC_V1.md').read(); print('##' in content and 'UPS-' in content)"

deliverables: specs/UNIVERSAL_PHASE_SPEC_V1.md with all sections tagged with UPS-* IDs
specs/metadata/ups_index.json with section index and metadata
notes: Part of parallel group GROUP-1. Can execute simultaneously with PH-1B and PH-1C as they have non-overlapping file scopes.
